Key.English: Player Combat Support (Artillery)
Key.Chinesesimp: 玩家战斗支援(火炮)

Key.English: Artillery Module for ALiVE Combat Support
Key.Chinesesimp: 用于ALiVE作战支持的火炮模块

Key.English: Place Module and set the settings accordingly! Sync to a Combat Support Module!
Key.Chinesesimp: 放置模块并设置相应的设置!同步到战斗支援模块!

Key.English: Callsign
Key.Chinesesimp: 呼号

Key.English: Enter the Callsign, ensure that it is unique
Key.Chinesesimp: 输入呼号，确保它是唯一的

Key.English: Arty\Mortar Type
Key.Chinesesimp: 火炮\迫击炮类型

Key.English: Type of Arty or Mortar e.g. BUS_MotInf_MortTeam
Key.Chinesesimp: 火炮或迫击炮类型 例如 BUS_MotInf_MortTeam

Key.English: Number of HE Rounds
Key.Chinesesimp: 高爆弹数量

Key.English: Set the number of rounds of HE available for the asset - Used by all Arty\Mortar Assets
Key.Chinesesimp: 设置物资可用的高爆弹数量 - 由所有火炮\迫击炮使用

Key.English: Number of ILLUM Rounds
Key.Chinesesimp: 照明弹数量

Key.English: Set the number of rounds of ILLUM available for the asset - Used by all Arty\Mortar Assets
Key.Chinesesimp: 设置物资可用的照明弹数量 - 由所有火炮\迫击炮使用

Key.English: Number of SMOKE Rounds
Key.Chinesesimp: 烟雾弹数量

Key.English: Set the number of rounds of SMOKE available for the asset - Used by all Arty\Mortar Assets
Key.Chinesesimp: 设置物资可用的烟雾弹数量 - 由所有火炮\迫击炮使用

Key.English: Number of WP Rounds
Key.Chinesesimp: 白磷弹数量

Key.English: Set the number of rounds of White Phospherous available for the asset - Used by all Arty\Mortar Assets
Key.Chinesesimp: 设置所有火炮/迫击炮装备可用白磷弹的数量

Key.English: Number of GUIDED Rounds
Key.Chinesesimp: 制导导弹数量

Key.English: Set the number of rounds of ROCKET available for the asset - Only used by MBT
Key.Chinesesimp: 设置物资可用的火箭弹数量 - 仅主战坦克使用

Key.English: Number of CLUSTER Rounds
Key.Chinesesimp: 子母弹数量

Key.English: Set the number of rounds of CLUSTERS available for the asset - Only used by MBT
Key.Chinesesimp: 设置物资可用的子母弹数量 - 仅主战坦克使用

Key.English: Number of Laser Guided Rounds
Key.Chinesesimp: 激光制导导弹数量

Key.English: Set the number of rounds of LG available for the asset - Only used by MBT
Key.Chinesesimp: 设置物资可用的激光制导导弹数量 - 仅主战坦克使用

Key.English: Number of MINE Rounds
Key.Chinesesimp: 布雷弹数量

Key.English: Set the number of rounds of MINE available for the asset - Only used by MBT
Key.Chinesesimp: 设置物资可用的布雷弹数量 - 仅主战坦克使用

Key.English: Number of AT MINES Rounds
Key.Chinesesimp: 反坦克布雷弹数量

Key.English: Set the number of rounds of AT MINES available for the asset - Only used by MBT
Key.Chinesesimp: 设置物资可用的反坦克布雷弹数量 - 仅主战坦克使用

Key.English: Number of ROCKET Rounds
Key.Chinesesimp: 火箭弹数量

Key.English: Set the number of rounds of 230mm Titan Missile available for the asset - Only used by MLRS
Key.Chinesesimp: 设置物资可用的230毫米泰坦导弹数量 - 仅多管火箭发射系统使用

Key.English: Code
Key.Chinesesimp: 代码

Key.English: Code that will be ran on each artillery piece
Key.Chinesesimp: 将在每门火炮上运行的代码
